website_summaries.verdict: A compact and versatile model for general-purpose inflation.
pros: Can work with car cigarette lighter if needed
Great for inflating multiple bike tires or basketballs
Features an LED light for emergency use
cons: Car tires might be stretching its capacity a bit, but there’s an optional power cord to handle that task if needed

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first negative amazon review ever. This electric pump is garbage. DON’T EVER BUY THIS!!! it worked once when i checked it after delivery. The first time i needed it to fix a tire on the road it froze on 0.00 and never pumped any air. Of course, it’s two weeks after the return deadline. WARNING! Because of this item i canceled my prime and will not purchase anything from amazon unless i get my $$$ back
customer_reviews.author: p3t3b

customer_reviews.title: See the detail in my review.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Accuracy of the pump was not there, 35 lb. on the pump, 38 lb. on two other measuring devices, including the car dash info. 2. The screen showing the information on the device was very small and not very bright, though the product was completely charged. Also difficult to read without a magnifying glass. 3. It was not easy to use because of the long time it took to put just 2 lbs. of pressure into a tire. Had to hold in in place for almost 5 minutes. At one point it actually started to remove air from the tire instead of increasing it. That, however, could have been the users fault. Overall, very disappointing, to say the least
customer_reviews.author: RONALD J MELARAGNI

customer_reviews.title: Where was this in my life ?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sleek versatile gadget. It can be used for inflating baloon all the way to car tires. I used it for my baby jogger stroller which has professional bike tires and it was done in a couple of minutes. The inflator itself took about 20 min to full charge. I love how it comes with a car charger, so I can always have a piece of mind in case of a flat tire situation. It totally exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: YARA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s gotten cold where I live and my car was showing that two of my tires were low. Not wanting to go to the gas station for air, I figured I’d buy this and give it a shot. It arrived about an hour ago. Out of the box and a quick glance at the directions, I headed out to the garage. I used the cigarette lighter adapter as a power source and had all 4 of my tires filled back up to specs (I used another tire pressure gauge I had just to be sure) within 15 minutes. This thing works exactly as it should. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.  Great for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to get my tires filled because there's no locations around my town that gets out free air (everyone's pump is always broken) or they charge $2-4 dollars just to get air. It works great and the noise level isn't as high as I thought it would be. More importantly, when fully charged, it pumped 2 completely flat tires to 32kpa. Very impressed with the amount of power it has.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Jian Tin

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tools to have in your garage/car, period. Beyond the fact that its great for car tires, I play a lot of sports so it comes in super handy with basketballs, soccer balls, and volleyballs. It's easy to use, its fast/accurate, and very well built. And it doubles as a battery pak for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: MoS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China low quality expensive POS
customer_reviews.text: ADDENDUM: ALREADY QUIT WORKING. I bought this air pump because I am a paraplegic in a wheelchair and my tires deflate. This stopped working today 15 days after the ability to return it expired. Don't waste your time. The quality is cheap and it won't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. it is very small (Bluetooth speaker size) and is easy to carry with you on your rides. I have been able to fill up 4 of my bikes and is still showing almost a full battery. just set the PSI you want and then hit start and the unit will cut off automatically and shows your bikes PSI. it sure beats pulling out my manual foot bike pump which you cannot carry, plus this thing is just fun to use which I now ensure my bikes are topped off before each ride.
customer_reviews.author: Hafida

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Product
customer_reviews.text: the pressure is very slow, and takes too long to be a real pump. The UBS charging ports would not change anything
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Compressor does not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: This compressor will not hold a charge long enough to pump a car tire from 28psi to 35psi. It runs out of battery power very quickly. I wouldn't buy this again. Not something you can depend on when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had any problems to date
customer_reviews.text: This product is good to top up car tires to the correct pressure. The USB charging is quick and allows me to top up all 4 tires with a single charge. I think the only time the USB charging will inadequate is if multiple tires are fully deflated. This has not happened to me. But there is a 12v Cigarette lighter adapter which directly powers the device in these situations.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it so far
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far so cannot comment on the lifespan of the pump but it’s definitely worth the investment. It’s compact enough to fit in my emergency roadside kit and having the option to use it with the battery or 12v is great. Pumped up 4 under inflated winter tires in near 0 degree temps in about 10 minutes. Easy to set the desired PSI and just let the pump do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Team Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gadget. It can be used for inflating baloon all the way to car tires. I used it for my kid basketball and beach toys. I also used to inflate my daughter bicycle tires. The inflator itself took about 20 min to full charge. I love how it comes with a car charger, so I can always have a piece of mind in case of a flat tire situation. It totally love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I give it an overall 4 stars since battery doesn't last long enough to do all 4 tires. I had to recharge. But it also comes with a cigarette lighter plug to recharge while on the road. Product should be improved to prolong the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Useful and a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I love my air compressor! It’s a life saver in a pinch. It takes the whole life of the battery for my car tire, but it does have a nice cigarette lighter port. I can fill my bike tires twice each, on one charge. Be careful, the attachment gets hot quickly!
customer_reviews.author: FrostySquidKid

customer_reviews.title: Stupid
customer_reviews.text: Dyou have a better chance of going on your knees and putting the valve in your mouth and blowing up the tire than in this stupid thing
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: Looks like junk, sounds like it might break. Takes like 15/20mins to pump a flat tire gets real hot after one tire, I’m afraid of using it on any other thing for a few hrs. Might be Ok in an emergency where you stuck on the side of a highway once in 2yrs but if you plan on using it often just go buy a portable air compressor that has a standard Air tank!
customer_reviews.author: KayDee

customer_reviews.title: Features work as expected, double check correct psi readings
customer_reviews.text: Unit required calibration as it was 5 psi off during first use. Second time I inflated tires the psi rating was off by 2-3. All of the features work as stated, easy to operate and well packaged. Major problem I encountered was getting accurate inflation. I'm not sure if there's a way to calibrate the device, but I ended up overinflating and releasing air.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: It’s simple, and it works 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: This is the simple review. I’ve owned this product for a couple of weeks now. I’ve used it once, and it did what I needed it to do. I was able to inflate 3 tires on my SUV off of one charge, and after plugging the device into the car charger. I was able to inflate the 4th tire. The device is small enough for me to store underneath the floor board, with my spare tire. I have 3 daughters that are of driving age, and I will be order one of these devices for each of them.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Just purchsed, but works great with no long term commentary
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great and as advertised. Very portable and small so doesn't take up much room on a motorcycle. Only charges with USB, but will work with the cigarette lighter plug...I sent one back because I thought it was faulty for NOT charging on the cigarette lighter plug...Company was very helpful and responsive when I contacted them. I would recommend the product....
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pump light combo
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for this is a nice lightweight compact very well-built air pump it also has a little LED light that works pretty good Even has a little storage place to put the hose when it’s not in use Like I said you get what you pay for I think they earned a five ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Richard
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It’s working good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air compressor; It’s working great and see it very useful and multifunctional, came with deferent tools and car charger, it is very small so you can keep it in the car. I bought it for two purposes; for my kids’ stuff such as bikes, balls, and balloons, also for my cars tire if it needed.
customer_reviews.author: Driss Quaboul

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use I really like this tool. I used it to inflate my kids balloons and my husband’s car tires. I also used to inflate my Boy’s bicycle tires. It t took about 20 min to full charge. it comes with a car charger, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanane

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This rechargeable portable air compressor is great for when I travel. It's helpful to know that I have access to air if I have a flat tire. This air compressor has a long battery life and is rechargeable. It is well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: KristaDD

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this rechargeable inflator for several months and have grown to love it. Really easy to use and with the auto shut-off at recommended air pressure ,i keep it in my garage for my bikes and balls and also one in my car for the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Didij

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband as a gift. He loves it. Going to use for camping. He likes the light and how compact it is. Fast shipping. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but the rubber lining the connector started to wear off and now it doesn't make a sealed connection with the tire anymore.
customer_reviews.author: macbad2012

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this portable compressor , I get it to fill up my electric scooter tires so I don't have to go to the gas station ^^ easy to use works very good and quick for the air mattress . I love this kind of little useful product 👌
customer_reviews.author: magid a.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product does the job, works great as described, now I don’t have to stop at the station to put air on my tires, thank you. Product recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bet buy of the Season..
customer_reviews.text: I used this to pump up my kids basketballs and Soccor balls. We also used this to pump up ballons for my son's Birthday. This is a great buy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmanchops2

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Hard to turn on, impossible to turn off. I ended up leaving it on the side of the road because it wouldn't shut off
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fahnert

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Very nice that it is portable. No need for cables. Only used it on my bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Cuban007

customer_reviews.title: Very handy due to its compact size
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described a bit louder than I expected for its size. But that is not a problem, it may just surprise you the first time you turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: Make’s a nice bicycle tire inflator.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to inflate a bicycle tire to 135 psi, and carry it in a bag on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: works as expected but hot.
customer_reviews.text: It's really hot , burning hot, after just topping off 2 tires of my bike. Other than that, it's working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few days. Now doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a week and a half if light use, then just turned off while still having almost full charge. Have charged it for a while day and it won't come back on. Wouldn't buy again given it can't be relied on, which is a shame because it was very handy for the time it did work.
customer_reviews.author: joshua kelley

customer_reviews.title: good but faulty
customer_reviews.text: loved it for the 3 times i was able to use it. just like some of the other reviews, i fully charged it out of the box like suggested, but it wouldn’t charge after that. had to return it and buy one of the slightly more expensive portable compressors with higher review stars
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Vehicle Tire Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Will have to revisit reviews after I have to use it. For now - unit is light weight, small enough to put in my handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai1731

customer_reviews.title: Presta Valves
customer_reviews.text: Cool device hut doesn't work well with presta valves. The attachment is shxt to say the least whether you screw it into your valve first or screw it into the compressor. It leaks air or doesn't inflate at all. You'll get either problem and will be returning it. The battery life is horrible. I do not recommend this for people with road bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Lot I Tested
customer_reviews.text: I bought and tried 5 different types of portable air pumps and tested them. By FAR this was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Del-O-L

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly strong suction for the size, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: Started out well ...didn't last.. barely made it 4 months.  Don't waste your investment.
customer_reviews.text: Product and price started well. Used and charged per instructions. Used 8 times to top off motorcycle tires before trip. Air stations charge $ 1.25 per use... This device cost me over $ 3.00 per use. Expected better from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but horrible charge worth
customer_reviews.text: But I want the fact I've only used it once the light that indicates of its charging keeps going on and off and I have to hold it to keep it going to charge I've only had it for less than 2 weeks I wouldn't feeling that for the last 2 times IV is death
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay musicant

customer_reviews.title: easy,convient, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you figure it out. charges overnight. Holds the charge for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C lark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/charges quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice, works well. However I can’t get it to push 80 psi into my bicycle tires.

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely easy to use, a great size and weight, and just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hinman

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: this Is a neat little compressor , easy to carry and to use . With digital screen you can adjust your psi just like any gastations pimps

customer_reviews.title: Portable & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This pump came in quality packaging as well as easy to read instruction. Pump works great and it’s easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Romar

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best but I assume not the worst....
customer_reviews.text: Yes easy to use, but... Dim display.... Takes a long time to work per tire..... Battery dies before even filling one tire... Cable not long enough ro get to all tires on a long sedan... Not very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Denham

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for each vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this to keep with my motorcycle for the past several months and have used it a time or two on my car. I ended up purchasing a second one just for the car now. I accidentally bought the A2 pump and immediately returned it for the A5. Having the accessory lighter plug is a huge benefit to this A5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and very easy to use it, it’s save my time. Even my kids used it for a infate Basketball . Has a long lasting battery and a flashlight and can be used to charge a phone
customer_reviews.author: abdelmajid aziz

customer_reviews.title: Hot air blowin tire filler
customer_reviews.text: Works great gets inferno hot good to use if your hands are cold or maybe you need to cook breakfast while you fill your tire.
customer_reviews.author: jess kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Makes bike riding easier and adds a degree of safety to long distance driving
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Get pumped
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I bought in a long time, works great for bicycle tires
customer_reviews.author: Albert S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like this air compressor! It Was good for my bikes, Good compressor compare to its size, lightweight, specially if you travel easy to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Retraction of poor review...
customer_reviews.text: Retraction....it works great....!!! I didn't realize a hole in my tube..hence it wouldn't shut off...beware of very hot parts and the unit indicator could b larger...I WOULD..PURCHASE AGAIN!! ....
customer_reviews.author: derek lubs

customer_reviews.title: Problem was taken care of by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are not great. Not detailed. No contact info for troubleshooting. First set i received, the unit did not charge. I called Amazon and had another unit sent out for next day delivery. This one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Can set the psi and it will shut off automatically when set point is reached. Nice feature! Bought to fill bike tires a d works as advertised. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rauschkolb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stop at another gas station for air!
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to use it, it is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, small enough to carry around, and fast at inflating my motorcycle tires.
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Sarlow

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my my husband for his Birthday. He uses it for our electric bikes. So far good purchase!!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/ easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I tried it couple times & it works fine, even my 5 years old son fix his bicycle tires pressure, easy to use ,small i store it in my car glove box & the battery last for a good time✌
customer_reviews.author: Abdeslam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because the convenience of to pump the air and use this portable air pump to fill up my tire. I used it and it fills up the air very fast and it shows the PSI it’s veru convenient and small and saves space. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep charge
customer_reviews.text: We charge the unit and it only will blow up two tires before it needs to be charged again.. If we could, we would return this

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service for this product. I received a unit that wouldn't charge. I contacted the company and immediately got a replacement. New unit works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: this worked well, air pressure was accurate, and it’s efficient. but the unit failed. Cycplus got right back to me when I notified them and they shipped me a new one. Good service!

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses with this little pump
customer_reviews.text: This little pump is quite useful, you can use it with moderation to pump air into your tires, it works also as flash light and a power bank, you can either charge it through a wall charger or a car charger, hopefullyit will last long, because I really like it so far.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.text: Like: portable, shutoff after presets psi is reached. Dislike: display is small and hard to read, no carrying case. Display psi is 5lbs over.

customer_reviews.title: Unlike most, this charges via USB, in addition to charging in a car.

product_meta.title: CYCPLUS Rechargeable Portable Air Compressor Tire Inflator Electric Pump 12V DC with Digital Gauge LCD Display Emergency LED Light Hand Held 150PSI High Pressure for Car Bike and Other Inflatable A5
feature_bullets: The latest design, more powerful and more convenient : Elegant exterior design, built-in Micro-USB line Lithium-Polymer Rechargeable Battery. The battery in the full charging could inflate an empty car tire, or 6 empty mountain bicycle tires, or 18 empty basketballs (0psi,but not Flat). Alternate custom car cigarette lighter power cords can be used when the dead battery or car tires inflated to need (the car cigarette lighter power cords can't be used for charging)

Anti-dazzling FSTN LCD (with backlight) has 4 kinds of unit values : PSI, BAR, KPA, Kg/cm ². You can preset tire pressure what your tire needs and monitor the tire pressure at any time. The maximum inflatable pressure is 150psi, which is suitable for bicycles, motorcycles, small and medium cars including SUV , but it is not applicable for large truck tires

Super Mini and light electric inflatable pump : The size is only 2.2 * 2.2 * 6.8 inches and it is only 350g in weight, which is the smallest and lightest portable inflatable pump in the marketplace, and you will have great feel when it is in your hand

Power Bank and Lighting Operation : For emergency, the product can charge for Android and iOS devices. The product can supply 7 hours and 80 lumens enduring lighting. There is built-in lithium battery protection board, batteries overcharge protection, overdischarge protection, short circuit protection, against undervoltage condition and temperature monitoring function

Good quality and good service : Lifetime after-sale service are offered from the date of purchase. If you have any questions, please feel free to come to us (Attention: Do not switch on the car air pump when it is recharging) Attention: CYCPLUS is the only store which have the right to sell this product on Amazon . ONLY buy it from CYCPLUS store can enjoy high-quality after-sale service
